lessons.japanese: 一本のチョークを取り出した。
lessons.indonesian: He took out a piece of chalk.

lessons.japanese: チョークを二本持ってきてください。
lessons.indonesian: Please bring me two pieces of chalk.

lessons.japanese: チョークを三本ください。
lessons.indonesian: Give me three pieces of chalk.

lessons.japanese: チョークを一本下さい。
lessons.indonesian: Give me a piece of chalk.

lessons.japanese: チョークを２本持って来い。
lessons.indonesian: Bring me two pieces of chalk.

lessons.japanese: チョークを１本持ってきてください。
lessons.indonesian: Bring me a piece of chalk.

lessons.japanese: チョークで書くのはやさしいことではない。
lessons.indonesian: It is not easy to write in chalk.

lessons.japanese: このチョークを持って、黒板に書きなさい。
lessons.indonesian: Take this piece of chalk and write on the blackboard.

lessons.japanese: あれは黄色いチョークではありません。
lessons.indonesian: That is not a yellow piece of chalk.

lessons.japanese: 一本のチョークを取り出した。
lessons.indonesian: He took out a piece of chalk.

lessons.japanese: チョークを二本持ってきてください。
lessons.indonesian: Please bring me two pieces of chalk.

lessons.japanese: チョークを三本ください。
lessons.indonesian: Give me three pieces of chalk.

lessons.japanese: チョークを三本ください。
lessons.indonesian: Please give me three pieces of chalk.

lessons.japanese: チョークを一本下さい。
lessons.indonesian: Give me a piece of chalk.
